name: Cryptonote
0:
”Alexa open crypto note”
”check the price of Ethereum”
”show me Bitcoin”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: crypto note
des:
Ask Alexa to check the latest price of cryptocurrencies, including:
- Ethereum
- Bitcoin
- Dogecoin
- Shiba Inu
- Cardano
- Polkadot
- Ravencoin
- Binance Coin
- Polygon
- Solana
- Litecoin

Prices are compared against the latest USD trading prices, sourcing data from Binance market books. Ticker/stock quotes are accurate to the minute.
